name: Nano-banana-pro
description: Generate images using Nano Banana Pro (Gemini 3 Pro) via the built-in tool.
prompt:
# Nano Banana Pro (Image Generation)

Use the built-in image generation tool.

Generate (preferred)

- Call the `generate_image` tool with:
  - `model`: `nano-banana-pro`
  - `prompt`: your image description
  - `imageSize`: `1K` or `2K`
  - `filename`: optional (saved into the workspace)

API key

- Requires Gemini API key configured in Settings.
- If the key is missing, tell the user to set it up and do not attempt fallbacks.
